trans-unit.source: , which means that, as of this release, passwords will not be redisplayed; this changes the default behavior wrt previous releases. Values typed into password fields are not redisplayed by default during validation failure, as a security measure (the value winds up in browser history). Use
trans-unit.target: ，这意味着从此版本开始，密码将不会重新显示；这将更改以前版本的默认行为。出于安全性的考虑，在验证失败期间，默认情况下不会重新显示在密码字段中键入的值（该值最终出现在浏览器历史记录中）。用

trans-unit.source: Add boolean HTML attributes per Chameleon 3.8.0.

trans-unit.source: AutocompleteInputWidget now accepts string type for “values”

Both Deform 1 and Deform 2 will be maintained going forward. If you wish to continue using Deform 1, because you cannot upgrade, or cannot depend on Bootstrap 3, please pin your deform distribution requirement to something below 2.0a1, e.g.

trans-unit.target: 将maskMoney.js碰撞到3.1.1，并使用缩小版本。 https://github.com/pylons/deform/issues/412

trans-unit.source: Change Python 3.7 to use stable version, 3.8-dev as allowed failure, in Travis. See https://github.com/Pylons/deform/pull/377
trans-unit.target: 在Travis中将Python 3.7更改为使用稳定版本3.8-dev作为允许的故障。参见https://github.com/pylons/deform/pull/377

trans-unit.source: Changed the implementation of input autofocus from JavaScript to an HTML5 input attribute.
trans-unit.target: 将输入自动对焦的实现从JavaScript改为HTML5输入属性。

trans-unit.source: Closes #333: MANIFEST.in including docs, licenses and text files.
trans-unit.target: 关闭 #333:MANIFEST.in 包括文档,许可证和文本文件。

trans-unit.source: Currently Python 3 file upload widget may have compatibility issues Please see deformdemo/test.py for details.
trans-unit.target: 目前Python 3文件上传小工具可能存在兼容性问题,详情请看deformdemo/test.py。

trans-unit.source: Currently description shows up as both tooltip of label and as help-block. Maybe make these two things separate or at least don’t show them both using the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的描述同时显示为标签的工具提示和帮助栏。也许将这两件事分开或者至少不要使用相同的值来显示它们。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeInputWidget now renders as two fields: one for a date and one for a time, using pickadate.
trans-unit.target: DateTimeInputWidget现在使用pickadate渲染为两个字段:一个是日期,一个是时间。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeInputWidget takes two options now: date_options and time_options instead of a single options dictionary. The options are pickadate date/time options respectively.
trans-unit.target: DateTimeInputWidget现在接受两个选项:date_options和time_options,而不是单一的选项字典。这些选项分别是pickadate日期/时间选项。

trans-unit.source: Declare Python 3.6 compatibility and enable tests against Python 3.6 (all tests pass with no changes).
trans-unit.target: 声明Python 3.6的兼容性,并启用针对Python 3.6的测试 (所有测试都通过,不做任何修改)。

trans-unit.source: Deform integrates with the Pyramid web framework and several other web frameworks. Deform comes with Chameleon templates and Bootstrap 3 styling. Under the hood, Colander schemas are used for serialization and validation. The Peppercorn library maps HTTP form submissions to nested structure.
trans-unit.target: Deform与Pyramid Web框架 和其他几个Web框架集成。Deform随附Chameleon模板和Bootstrap 3样式。在后台，Colander模式用于序列化和验证。的胡椒子库HTTP表单提交映射到嵌套结构。

trans-unit.source: Deform is a Python form library for generating HTML forms on the server side. Date and time picking widgets, rich text editors, forms with dynamically added and removed items and a few other complex use cases are supported out of the box.
trans-unit.target: Deform是一个Python表单库，用于在服务器端生成HTML表单。 开箱即用地支持日期和时间选择小部件， 富文本编辑器，具有动态添加和删除项目的表单以及其他一些复杂的用例。

trans-unit.source: Deform is ideal for complex server-side generated forms. Potential use cases include:
trans-unit.target: Deform是复杂的服务器端生成表单的理想选择。潜在的使用案例包括:

trans-unit.source: Documentation reorganization and clean up to conform with Pylons Project projects.
trans-unit.target: 文件重组和清理,以符合Pylons项目的要求。

trans-unit.source: Don’t cause unnecessary JavaScript calls on page load https://github.com/Pylons/deform/pull/267/
trans-unit.target: 不要在页面加载时造成不必要的JavaScript调用https://github.com/pylons/deform/pull/267/

Fix a bug that was introduced in 2.0.11 that made it such that the

trans-unit.source: Fix deprecation warning when importing the module
trans-unit.target: 修正导入模块时的弃用警告。

trans-unit.source: Fix select and select2 widget templates failing on Python 3.x
trans-unit.target: 修正在Python 3.x上select和select2 widget模板失效的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed handling of buttons in nested sequences. See https://github.com/Pylons/deform/issues/197
trans-unit.target: 修复了嵌套序列中按钮的处理。参见https://github.com/pylons/deform/issues/197

trans-unit.source: Form library with advanced features like nested forms
trans-unit.target: 具有嵌套表单等高级功能的表单库
表格现在有一个可选的

trans-unit.source: Have the button css_class override the default button class. This is backwards-incompatible and will require users of css_class to add a btn-default/btn-primary class to the css_class.
trans-unit.target: 让按钮css_class覆盖默认的按钮类。这是向后不兼容的,需要css_class的用户在css_class中添加一个btn-default/btn-primary类。

trans-unit.source: Improved the script that launches Selenium webdriver to clean up the locale directory after completing a run of functional tests so that its files do not get committed by accident. We also enforce coding style and add a formatter, and improved the contributing documentation. See https://github.com/Pylons/deform/pull/428
trans-unit.target: 改进了脚本，该脚本可在完成一系列功能测试后启动Selenium Webdriver来清理语言环境目录，以免意外删除其文件。我们还强制实施编码样式并添加格式化程序，并改进了提供的文档。参见https://github.com/pylons/deform/pull/428

trans-unit.source: Install using pip and Python package installation best practices:

trans-unit.source: This example is in deformdemo repository. Run the example with pserve:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在distedemo库中。使用pserve运行示例：

trans-unit.source: This first alpha release is missing formal documentation updates. Apologies, we needed to get a release out onto PyPI, as not having one is holding back the development of a number of platforms and applications that depend on the changes in v2+. Documentation updates will be forthcoming over the lifetime of future alpha/beta releases. However, below is a list of known issues that need to be addressed to make a final release of Deform 2, as well as information about new features, and migration notes. You may also be able to make use of the demo site at https://deformdemo.pylonsproject.org to divine how things have changed, and what CSS and JavaScript resources you’ll need to include in your pages to make use of this release.
trans-unit.target: 此第一个Alpha版本缺少正式的文档更新。抱歉，我们需要发布到PyPI上，因为没有人阻碍了依赖于v2 +更改的许多平台和应用程序的开发。在将来的alpha / beta版本的整个生命周期中，将进行文档更新。但是，下面列出了最终版本Deform 2需要解决的已知问题，以及有关新功能和迁移说明的信息。您也许还可以使用位于https://deformdemo.pylonsproject.org的演示站点来了解情况已发生了什么变化，以及需要使用哪些CSS和JavaScript资源才能包含在此页面中以使用此版本。 。

trans-unit.source: This is an alpha release of Deform v2. Deform v2 is backwards incompatible with Deform v1. It requires the use of Twitter Bootstrap v3, whereas deform v1 did not require Bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 这是Deform v2的alpha版本。Deform v2与Deform v1向后不兼容,它需要使用Twitter Bootstrap v3,而deform v1不需要Bootstrap。

trans-unit.source: This library is actively developed and maintained. Deform 2.x branch has been used in production on several sites since 2014. Automatic test suite has 100% Python code coverage and 500+ tests.
trans-unit.target: 这个库是积极开发和维护的。自2014年以来,Deform 2.x分支已经在多个网站的生产中使用。自动测试套件有100%的Python代码覆盖率和500多个测试。

trans-unit.source: widgets no longer accepts “size” (instead use style=”width: x”), except SelectWidget (it means the size of the dropdown)
trans-unit.target: 小部件不再接受“大小”（而是使用style =“ width：x”），但SelectWidget除外（这表示下拉列表的大小）

trans-unit.source: work again by using the fixed name “date” as expected by the pstruct schema. See https://github.com/Pylons/deform/pull/221.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用pstruct模式期望的固定名称“日期”来再次工作。参见https://github.com/pylons/deform/pull/221。

trans-unit.source: would not show up as a css class name in rendered template output. See https://github.com/Pylons/deform/pull/191
trans-unit.target: 不会在呈现的模板输出中显示为css类名称。参见https://github.com/pylons/deform/pull/191
